creator: PlisPlasPlay
descriptionHtml:
FusionCam is an auto background changer camera with a photo editor tool for creating personal WhatsApp stickers, wonderful memes with its photomontage editor.
( WAStickerApps ).

Selfie Fusion Camera is the best free camera capable of making photomontages in real time getting spectacular and realistic photos, with the colors between the background and front image adjusted in great detail. You can also edit the fusion with our photo editor to improve the final result and share as image or as WhatsApp Sticker.

We allow you to merge images from the camera with any background.

Among the infinite possibilities we highlight (remember that before using an image you must take into account its license to use it):
- Change background from photos of the device gallery
- You can independently move, scale and rotate the image of your background
- Add yourself to your friends photos
- Appear in travel pictures and vacation spots to make jokes to your friends
- Create funny photos
- Get pictures color effects by coloring images in different styles between the front and the background
- Make selfies with celebrities
- Appear on stage next to the artists you like the most
- Get your picture taken in exotic places.
- Get selfies with soccer players or with your favorite sports person
- Appear in the photos next to animals, dinosaurs, plants, flowers.
- Get your picture taken in places of science fiction (on the moon, on Mars...)
- Make posters advertising objects with the background you want
- Use the application in the style of a chromatic film background, but without having to have a specific color background (green screen).

You will be able to take beautiful and spectacular instant photos and see how they will look with the background you want and then perfect them with the photo editor.

Selfie Fusion Cam is a free real time photo background changer and has an online pixabay photo search engine with thousands of different backgrounds such as famous buildings, monuments, beaches, mountains, animals, sunsets... You can also put any image from your gallery as a background. You can also remove the background of the camera without replacing it with anything else storing it later in PNG format.

The idea behind Selfie Fusion Camera is the same as in a chroma, only that the background detection is dynamic.

It allows:

- Delete background image of the photo in real time

- Edit the resulting image so that the photomontage between the front taken by the camera and the background chosen by you will be an amazing picture.

- Change the background of the photo automatically

- Choose from your gallery backgrounds or from thousands of free backgrounds available online.

- Change the background photos without cutting

- The camera image background detection is automatic: If a new object is placed on the picture without moving it will be detected to remove it automatically. It can also be locked so that the camera image background detection does not adapt to changes.

- Our photo editor allows you to crop, rotate or reverse before saving.

To make the photomontage of the image with the background as realistic as possible, it has colour settings for both: the front and the background image. These color settings include:
- Vignette: darkens the image
- Tint: change the color for another complementary color
- Hue: Changes the tone of the photo
- Saturation: Makes colors more vivid or muted
- Hue: apply a color filter to the photo
- Brightness: lightens or darkens the image
- Contrast: highlights the difference between black and white in the photo

Once you have the desired photomontage you can share it in your social networks or save it in your gallery.

Fusion Cam provides an original and fast way to make photomontages without requiring high knowledge of photo editing.
descriptionShort: Change or erase the photo background image camera. Photomontage in real time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Bug fixes

title: Camera Photo Auto Background Changer : Fusion Cam

creator: PlisPlasPlay
descriptionHtml:
FusionCam is an auto background changer camera with a photo editor tool for creating personal WhatsApp stickers, wonderful memes with its photomontage editor.
( WAStickerApps ).

Selfie Fusion Camera is the best free camera capable of making photomontages in real time getting spectacular and realistic photos, with the colors between the background and front image adjusted in great detail. You can also edit the fusion with our photo editor to improve the final result and share as image or as WhatsApp Sticker.

We allow you to merge images from the camera with any background.

Among the infinite possibilities we highlight (remember that before using an image you must take into account its license to use it):
- Change background from photos of the device gallery
- You can independently move, scale and rotate the image of your background
- Add yourself to your friends photos
- Appear in travel pictures and vacation spots to make jokes to your friends
- Create funny photos
- Get pictures color effects by coloring images in different styles between the front and the background
- Make selfies with celebrities
- Appear on stage next to the artists you like the most
- Get your picture taken in exotic places.
- Get selfies with soccer players or with your favorite sports person
- Appear in the photos next to animals, dinosaurs, plants, flowers.
- Get your picture taken in places of science fiction (on the moon, on Mars...)
- Make posters advertising objects with the background you want
- Use the application in the style of a chromatic film background, but without having to have a specific color background (green screen).

You will be able to take beautiful and spectacular instant photos and see how they will look with the background you want and then perfect them with the photo editor.

Selfie Fusion Cam is a free real time photo background changer and has an online pixabay photo search engine with thousands of different backgrounds such as famous buildings, monuments, beaches, mountains, animals, sunsets... You can also put any image from your gallery as a background. You can also remove the background of the camera without replacing it with anything else storing it later in PNG format.

The idea behind Selfie Fusion Camera is the same as in a chroma, only that the background detection is dynamic.

It allows:

- Delete background image of the photo in real time

- Edit the resulting image so that the photomontage between the front taken by the camera and the background chosen by you will be an amazing picture.

- Change the background of the photo automatically

- Choose from your gallery backgrounds or from thousands of free backgrounds available online.

- Change the background photos without cutting

- The camera image background detection is automatic: If a new object is placed on the picture without moving it will be detected to remove it automatically. It can also be locked so that the camera image background detection does not adapt to changes.

- Our photo editor allows you to crop, rotate or reverse before saving.

To make the photomontage of the image with the background as realistic as possible, it has colour settings for both: the front and the background image. These color settings include:
- Vignette: darkens the image
- Tint: change the color for another complementary color
- Hue: Changes the tone of the photo
- Saturation: Makes colors more vivid or muted
- Hue: apply a color filter to the photo
- Brightness: lightens or darkens the image
- Contrast: highlights the difference between black and white in the photo

Once you have the desired photomontage you can share it in your social networks or save it in your gallery.

Fusion Cam provides an original and fast way to make photomontages without requiring high knowledge of photo editing.
descriptionShort: Change or erase the photo background image camera. Photomontage in real time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Modify the audio from video with effects
- Bug fixes

Fusion Cam provides an original and fast way to make photomontages without requiring high knowledge of photo editing.
descriptionShort: Change or erase the photo background image camera. Photomontage in real time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved video recording
- Improved sticker creation
